summary.span: 表示每個執行緒的靜態欄位值是唯一的。

span.span: Indicates that the value of a static field is unique for each thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`static`欄位標示為不會在執行緒之間共用。A `static` field marked with is not shared between threads. 每個執行中執行緒都有個別的執行個體的欄位中，獨立設定和取得該欄位的值。Each executing thread has a separate instance of the field, and independently sets and gets values for that field. 如果在不同的執行緒存取的欄位時，它會包含不同的值。If the field is accessed on a different thread, it will contain a different value. 請注意，除了套用屬性欄位中，您也必須定義成`static`欄位 （在 C# 中) 或`Shared`欄位 （在 Visual Basic)。Note that in addition to applying the attribute to a field, you must also define it as a `static` field (in C#) or a `Shared` field (in Visual Basic). > [!NOTE] > 請勿指定起始值的欄位標記為`ThreadStaticAttribute`，因為只有一次，當類別建構函式執行時，並因此會影響只有一個執行緒，就會發生這類初始化。Do not specify initial values for fields marked with `ThreadStaticAttribute`, because such initialization occurs only once, when the class constructor executes, and therefore affects only one thread. 如果您未指定一個初始值，您可以依賴欄位會初始化為其預設值，如果它是實值類型，或`null`如果它是參考型別。If you do not specify an initial value, you can rely on the field being initialized to its default value if it is a value type, or to `null` if it is a reference type. 使用這個屬性，因為它，而不是衍生自它。Use this attribute as it is, and do not derive from it. 如需使用屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例會具現化亂數產生器、 建立 10 個執行緒的主執行緒，除了，然後會在每個執行緒中的產生兩百萬隨機數字。The following example instantiates a random number generator, creates ten threads in addition to the main thread, and then generates two million random numbers in each thread. 它會使用屬性來計算每個執行緒的隨機數字的計數與總和。It uses the attribute to calculate the sum and the count of random numbers per thread. 它也會定義兩個額外的每個執行緒欄位`previous`和`abnormal`，可讓它偵測到損毀的亂數產生器。It also defines two additional per-thread fields, `previous` and `abnormal`, that allows it to detect corruption of the random number generator. [!code-csharp[System.ThreadStaticAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threadstaticattribute/cs/threadsafe2a.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ThreadStaticAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threadstaticattribute/vb/threadsafe2a.vb#1)] 此範例會使用`lock`C# 中的陳述式和`SyncLock`建構在 Visual Basic 來同步存取亂數產生器中。The example uses the `lock` statement in C# and the `SyncLock` construct in Visual Basic to synchronize access to the random number generator. 這可避免損毀的隨機號碼產生器，這通常會導致其傳回值為零的所有後續的呼叫。This prevents corruption of the random number generator, which typically results in its returning a value of zero for all subsequent calls. 此範例也會使用類別，以確保每個執行緒已完成產生隨機數字，然後再顯示的呼叫總數。The example also uses the class to ensure that each thread has finished generating random numbers before it displays the total number of calls. 否則，如果主執行緒完成執行之前它會繁衍的其他執行緒，它就會顯示方法呼叫的總數不正確的值。Otherwise, if the main thread completes execution before the additional threads that it spawns, it displays an inaccurate value for the total number of method calls.
